x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.description: With the changes in Jakarta release, a new column has been added to resource_event_color table named "type" of type choice list pointing to the choices of category column in time_card table. This fix script will copy the values of the column event_type to type if the value of event_type is a valid choice for the column type
x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.name: Copy event types in resource_event_color

sys_update_version.name: x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts_79c673cc83e89e50c6695855eeaad392
